## Public Member Functions

### isTargetMemoryOpcode() {#a0591246a89154bf5ccb82a8736cd893d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool PPCSelectionDAGInfo::isTargetMemoryOpcode (unsigned Opcode) const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true if a node with the given target-specific opcode has a memory operand.

Nodes with such opcodes can only be created with <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ae6cc63109335eefe2c5727d1e12fc820">SelectionDAG::getMemIntrinsicNode</a></code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-h/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-h">PPCSelectionDAGInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-cpp/#l00016">16</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-cpp">PPCSelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isTargetStrictFPOpcode() {#a5c9103845e3b58053ed02512c0a592eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool PPCSelectionDAGInfo::isTargetStrictFPOpcode (unsigned Opcode) const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true if a node with the given target-specific opcode has strict floating-point semantics.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-h/#l00022">22</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-h">PPCSelectionDAGInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcselectiondaginfo-cpp">PPCSelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
